message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $10,500.  This product provides immense value, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
